name: NSStandardKeyBindingResponding
desc: Methods that responder subclasses implement to support key binding commands, such as inserting tabs and newlines, or moving the insertion point.

items.name: func doCommand(by: Selector)
items.desc: Performs the given selector if possible.

items.name: func insertBacktab(Any?)
items.desc: Inserts a backtab character.

items.name: func insertContainerBreak(Any?)
items.desc: Inserts a container break, such as a new page break.

items.name: func insertDoubleQuoteIgnoringSubstitution(Any?)
items.desc: Inserts a double quotation mark without substituting a curly quotation mark.

items.name: func insertLineBreak(Any?)
items.desc: Inserts a line break character.

items.name: func insertNewline(Any?)
items.desc: Inserts a newline character.

items.name: func insertNewlineIgnoringFieldEditor(Any?)
items.desc: Inserts a newline character without invoking the field editorâ€™s normal handling to end editing.

items.name: func insertParagraphSeparator(Any?)
items.desc: Inserts a paragraph separator.

items.name: func insertTab(Any?)
items.desc: Inserts a tab character.

items.name: func insertText(Any)
items.desc: Inserts the text you specify.

items.name: func deleteBackward(Any?)
items.desc: Deletes content moving backward from the current insertion point.

items.name: func deleteToBeginningOfLine(Any?)
items.desc: Deletes content from the insertion point to the beginning of the current line.

items.name: func deleteToBeginningOfParagraph(Any?)
items.desc: Deletes content from the insertion point to the beginning of the current paragraph.

items.name: func deleteToEndOfLine(Any?)
items.desc: Deletes content from the insertion point to the end of the current line.

items.name: func deleteToEndOfParagraph(Any?)
items.desc: Deletes content from the insertion point to the end of the current paragraph.

items.name: func deleteWordBackward(Any?)
items.desc: Deletes the word preceding the current insertion point.

items.name: func yank(Any?)
items.desc: Deletes the current selection, placing it in a temporary buffer, such as the Clipboard.

items.name: func moveBackward(Any?)
items.desc: Moves the insertion pointer backward in the current content.

items.name: func moveDown(Any?)
items.desc: Moves the insertion pointer down in the current content.

items.name: func moveForward(Any?)
items.desc: Moves the insertion pointer forward in the current content.

items.name: func moveLeft(Any?)
items.desc: Moves the insertion pointer left in the current content.

items.name: func moveRight(Any?)
items.desc: Moves the insertion pointer right in the current content.

items.name: func moveUp(Any?)
items.desc: Moves the insertion pointer up in the current content.

items.name: func moveBackwardAndModifySelection(Any?)
items.desc: Extends the selection to include the content before the current selection.

items.name: func moveDownAndModifySelection(Any?)
items.desc: Extends the selection to include the content below the current selection.

items.name: func moveForwardAndModifySelection(Any?)
items.desc: Extends the selection to include the content after the current selection.

items.name: func moveLeftAndModifySelection(Any?)
items.desc: Extends the selection to include the content to the left of the current selection.

items.name: func moveRightAndModifySelection(Any?)
items.desc: Extends the selection to include the content to the right of the current selection.

items.name: func moveUpAndModifySelection(Any?)
items.desc: Extends the selection to include the content above the current selection.

items.name: func scrollPageDown(Any?)
items.desc: Scrolls the content down by a page.

items.name: func scrollPageUp(Any?)
items.desc: Scrolls the content up by a page.

items.name: func scrollLineDown(Any?)
items.desc: Scrolls the content down by a line.

items.name: func scrollLineUp(Any?)
items.desc: Scrolls the content up by a line.

items.name: func scrollToBeginningOfDocument(Any?)
items.desc: Scrolls the content to the beginning of the document.

items.name: func scrollToEndOfDocument(Any?)
items.desc: Scrolls the content to the end of the document.

items.name: func pageDown(Any?)
items.desc: Moves the visible content region down by a page.

items.name: func pageUp(Any?)
items.desc: Moves the visible content region up by a page.

items.name: func pageDownAndModifySelection(Any?)
items.desc: Moves the visible content region down by a page, and extends the current selection.

items.name: func pageUpAndModifySelection(Any?)
items.desc: Moves the visible content region up by a page, and extends the current selection.

items.name: func centerSelectionInVisibleArea(Any?)
items.desc: Moves the visible content region so the current selection is visually centered.

items.name: func transpose(Any?)
items.desc: Transposes the content around the current selection.

items.name: func transposeWords(Any?)
items.desc: Transposes the words around the current selection.

items.name: func indent(Any?)
items.desc: Indents the content at the current selection.

items.name: func cancelOperation(Any?)
items.desc: Cancels the current operation.

items.name: func quickLookPreviewItems(Any?)
items.desc: Invokes QuickLook to preview the current selection.
